synopsis.text:
Glan and his human companion, Jim, are innkeepers by trade, but adventurers at heart. One fateful day, a cryptic stranger leaves them a map to the legendary Treasure Island, once the hiding place of the notorious pirate, Captain Flint. Seizing the opportunity to fulfill their dreams of sailing the open seas, the duo, along with a stowaway named Baboo, embarks on a thrilling journey.

As they navigate the perilous waters, they cross paths with the infamous Captain Silver and his ruthless pirate crew, who are also in pursuit of the hidden treasure. Captured and taken to the pirate island, Jim and Glan meet Kathy, Captain Flint's granddaughter. Together, they manage a daring escape and reclaim their precious map.

Now, with the relentless Captain Silver hot on their heels, Jim, Glan, and Kathy must race against time to find the treasure before it falls into the wrong hands. As they face treacherous storms, dangerous sea creatures, and the constant threat of pirates, their courage and friendship will be tested like never before. Will they be able to outwit Captain Silver and claim the treasure for themselves? Only time will tell in this swashbuckling adventure on the high seas.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
